geocoding-error-details.description: There was a problem georeferencing your data

geocoding-success-detail.remainingQuotaFormatted: You still have %{remainingQuotaFormatted} credits left for this month.
geocoding-success-detail.title: Data geocoded

private.body: Your map is private. Change your privacy settings to share your map. Right now it's private.

embed.body: Insert your map into your blog, website, or simple application.

private.body: Your map is private. Change your privacy settings to embed your map. Right now it's private.

cartodbjs.body: Add your map to your applications using this URL.

mobile-sdk.title: CartoDB Mobile SDK

error.title: We couldn't save your data
error.subtitle: We had an internal error trying to save your data. We recommend you try again.

add-analysis.modal-desc: Select the analysis you want to add
add-analysis.disabled-option-desc: Your layer's geometries are %{simpleGeometryType} and this analysis needs %{requiredInputGeometries}

aggregate-intersection.title: Intersect second layer
aggregate-intersection.desc: Aggregate data in a second layer as a new column.

area-of-influence.title: Create areas of influence
area-of-influence.desc: Use travel time (e.g. walking or driving) or distance to calculate areas of influence from points.

georeference.title: Georeference
georeference.desc: Use street addresses, city names, or other location text to generate point geometries.

filter-intersection.title: Filter points in polygon
filter-intersection.desc: Filter points intersecting your polygon layer, and augment those with your polygons columns.

filter.title: Filter rows by column value
filter.desc: Keep or discard rows according to a custom criteria.

merge.title: Join columns from 2nd layer
merge.desc: Join columns from a second layer by linking a shared value found in both datasets.

moran-cluster.title: Detect outliers and clusters
moran-cluster.desc: Use Moran's I to find high (HL) and low (LH) outliers and high (HH) and low (LL) clusters.

kmeans.title: Calculate clusters of points
kmeans.desc: Spatially separate a layer of points into a specified number (N) of groups.

centroid.title: Find centroid of geometries
centroid.desc: Calculate a direct or weighted centroid based on all rows of a layer or by categories.

filter-by-node-column.title: Filter by layer
filter-by-node-column.desc: Filter your layer depending on a second layer such that widgets will effect both.

sampling.title: Subsample percent of rows
sampling.desc: Subsample the rows in a dataset based on a specified percent.

spatial-markov-trend.title: Predict trends and volatility
spatial-markov-trend.desc: Predict probability of upward and downward trends using spatial Markov chains.

data-observatory-measure.title: Enrich from Data Observatory
data-observatory-measure.desc: Add a new column with contextual demographic and economic measures.

add-widgets.modal-desc: Select the widgets you want to add
add-widgets.time-series-no-option-desc: This option won't show your time-series widget

add-layer.modal-desc: Select an existing dataset or connect a new one
